text: sihamte ka’ba, ‘tumi paraitra arau mahana! Tomara bahirae ana karaobaka abhibharakaraupe grahana karaa amara babe ketiya'o ucita nahaya, baram tumiye'i sihamtaka arau sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka bhoga-sambhara pradana karaichila, phalata sihamte (tomara) smarana paharai gaichila arau dhbansapraapta sampradayata parainata haichila’
